home.tagline: Split your secrets among people you trust
home.subtitle: Keepers uses Shamir's Secret Sharing to split your sensitive information into pieces. No single person can access your secret alone.

splitSecure.title: Split & Secure
splitSecure.description: Your secret is mathematically split into pieces that are useless alone

trustedCircle.title: Trusted Circle
trustedCircle.description: Choose who holds your secret pieces and how many are needed

trulyPrivate.title: Truly Private
trulyPrivate.description: Everything happens in your browser. Nothing is stored anywhere

step1.title: Enter your secret
step1.description: Your crypto wallet seed phrase, password manager master key, or any sensitive information

step2.title: Add your trusted keepers
step2.description: Family members, close friends, or trusted advisors who will each hold a piece

step3.title: Generate & distribute PDFs

security.title: Security guarantees
security.noServers: No servers, no databases, no accounts

footer.privacy: Your secrets never leave your browser

step1.title: About You
step1.description: This information will appear on your keepers' documents so they know who the secret belongs to.
step1.nameHelp: Keepers will see this on their document
step1.contactHelp: So keepers can reach you for routine recovery

step2.title: Your Secret
step2.description: Enter the secret you want to protect. This will be split among your keepers.
step2.typeLabel: What type of secret is this?
step2.customTypeLabel: What type of secret is this?
step2.customTypePlaceholder: e.g., Bank account details, API keys, etc.
step2.accountIdTooltip: Enter your account identifier to help locate your account during recovery. This could be an email, username, or wallet address depending on the service.
step2.verifyBip39Tooltip: Check if your recovery phrase uses valid BIP39 words. This helps catch typos but does NOT validate the phrase itself. Note: Not all services use BIP39 word lists for their recovery keys.
step2.validationSuccess: All words are valid BIP39 words
step2.secretPlaceholder: Enter your seed phrase, master password, or other secret...
step2.secretHelp: This will be encrypted and split among your keepers
step2.warning: Make sure you're in a private location and no one can see your screen

step3.title: Your Keepers
step3.description: These are people you trust to help recover your secret if something happens.
step3.storageLabel: Where will you store / send their copy?
step3.storagePlaceholder: e.g., In their safe, Sent via Signal, In their password manager
step3.storageHelp: This note appears on other keepers' PDFs so they can help locate it if needed.
step3.languageHelp: Language for their PDF document. Non-English PDFs include an English copy.
step3.thresholdLabel: How many keepers needed to recover?
step3.warningLowThreshold: Less secure: one person can recover your secret alone.
step3.warningHighThreshold: Risky: if anyone loses their document, recovery becomes impossible.
step3.protectionInfo: Protects against {{count}} keeper(s) losing their document.

step4.title: Message to Keepers
step4.description: This message appears on everyone's document. Explain what this is for and when to use it.
step4.messagePlaceholder: Write a message to your keepers...
step4.templateDescription: A template explaining when keepers should help and what to do in different situations.
step4.template:
Dear Keeper,

You're receiving this because I trust you deeply. This document contains a piece of my {{secretType}}.

If I ever need to recover my secret, I'll reach out to you. Please keep this document safe and private.

If something happens to me and others need to recover my secret, they'll contact you. You'll need to share your piece with at least {{threshold}} other keeper(s).

Thank you for being someone I can trust.

{{ownerName}}
step4.topic2: When they should help vs. refuse
step4.topic3: Who in your family should benefit

step5.title: Review & Generate
step5.description: Review your setup before generating keeper documents.
step5.warning1: Your secret will be split and cleared from memory
step5.warning2: Download and distribute the PDFs carefully
step5.warning3: Consider printing and deleting digital copies
step5.recoveryDescription: Any {{threshold}} of {{total}} keepers can recover your secret

step6.title: Documents Ready
step6.description: Your secret has been split. Download each keeper's document and share it with them securely.
step6.referenceCopyDesc: Contains all keeper contacts (no secret piece)
step6.secretCleared: Secret cleared from memory. Refresh this page to start over.
step6.tip1: Send documents through secure channels (Signal, encrypted email)
step6.tip2: Consider printing and handing physical copies
step6.tip3: Make sure keepers store their documents safely
step6.tip4: Test recovery before relying on this setup

step7.title: Verify Your Setup
step7.description: Test that your secret can be recovered by combining pieces. Select any {{threshold}} pieces to verify.
step7.recoverySuccessDesc: Your secret was successfully recovered by combining {{count}} pieces. Your setup is working correctly.
step7.recoveryFailedDesc: The recovered secret doesn't match the original. This shouldn't happen with valid shares. Please try again or regenerate your documents.
step7.testDifferentDesc: Try selecting different sets of {{threshold}} keepers to verify that any valid combination works. This ensures your setup is resilient.
step7.setupCompleteDesc: Your keeper documents are ready. Remember to distribute them securely.
step7.securityReminderDesc: Your secret is only as safe as the people who hold it. Choose keepers wisely and update your setup if circumstances change.

recover.title: Recover a Secret
recover.description: You'll need pieces from multiple keepers. Check your Keeper document for details.
recover.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type the code from your document

errors.duplicate: This piece has already been added.
errors.invalidFormat: Invalid piece format. Please check and try again.
errors.needAtLeast2: You need at least 2 pieces to recover.
errors.recoveryFailed: Could not recover the secret. The pieces may not match or may be invalid.
errors.piecesMismatch: These pieces don't seem to match. This can happen if pieces were typed incorrectly or are from different secrets.

success.title: Secret Recovered!
success.warning: This secret will disappear when you leave this page. Make sure to copy and store it safely.

recover.help: Need help? Check your Keeper document for instructions and other keeper contacts.

qrScanner.title: Scan QR Code
qrScanner.instruction: Point your camera at the QR code on the keeper document
qrScanner.cameraError: Could not access camera. Please check permissions or enter manually.
qrScanner.cameraErrorDesc: Please allow camera access or enter the code manually.

pdf.title: KEEPER DOCUMENT
pdf.subtitle: Secret Recovery Document
pdf.whenToUseDesc: This document contains your piece of a secret. You may need to use it if:
pdf.useCase1: The owner asks you to help recover their secret
pdf.useCase2: Something happens to the owner and authorized parties need access
pdf.ifOwnerAsksDesc: They may have lost access and needs your piece. Read them the code below or help enter it at neeraj-pilot.github.io/keepers/recover
pdf.ifOwnerUnavailable: If {{name}} is unavailable or has passed:
pdf.ifOwnerUnavailableDesc: Contact the other keepers listed below. Together (any {{threshold}} of you) can recover the secret for their family.
pdf.pieceInstruction: This is your unique piece. Keep it safe and private.
pdf.scanOrType: Scan the QR code or type this code:
pdf.otherKeepersDesc: Contact these people to coordinate recovery:
pdf.recoverStep3: 3. Have another keeper add their piece
pdf.ifSiteUnavailableDesc: This uses standard Shamir Secret Sharing. Any compatible tool can combine the pieces.
pdf.footer: Keep this document in a safe place. Do not share it except for recovery purposes.
